concept.title: Payroll Model Management
concept.shortdesc: Manage payroll model tasks using the Payroll Models Summary page.

ul.li: View a list of available payroll models, including associated pay groups, security permissions, creation date, and last modification date
Delete a payroll model that is not system-delivered and not associated with a pay group

conbody.p: Each pay period, the payroll administrator performs a series of steps to process a payroll and create employee pay statements. However, not all pay groups require the same processing steps. For example, one pay group may be configured to enter employee payroll information. Another pay group may be configured to import employee payroll information from a time clock system. UltiPro provides many system-delivered payroll models to designate which processing steps must be completed for each pay group.
